replies.body: Fight together, Win together! United we triumph!
I thought the house prize would be bigger like a skin orb or shard or sth :P
non-purchaseable content achieved through play is the rarest and best way to reward, imo
{{sticker:sg-lux}} Like, what actually WAS the point system? Cause 65 seems a bit, small, for player interaction xD
i think it was each week they gave houses points depending on where they placed for that week, so first place would get like 20 points, second would get 18, then 15 then 10 or something like that
Anyone know if this was done as missions per capita?
Highly disappointing if it was per capita, since when does power in numbers not count for anything

When do we get our gold emotes?
P.S. My Fan Pass isn't giving me rewards when i finish challenges.

*apologies in advance for bad shen puns*

{{champion:98}} this event was already won. Pity you didn't even have the chance to catch up
